casebody.data:
PEOPLE of the State of Michigan, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
Edmund Daniel BARSKI, Defendant-Appellant. SC: 158228
COA: 341942 Supreme Court of Michigan. October 19, 2018

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of defendant-appellant to extend the time for filing his reply is GRANTED. The reply submitted on October 1, 2018, is accepted as timely filed.
